title: New Kern fashion
content:
hey  
Just thought that you may want to check out some new type buttons I have made.

if you would like some just send me an email [garus@bythebooth.com](mailto:garus@bythebooth.com)  
or check out my pre launch site at [http://www.bythebooth.com/php/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120211225756/http:/www.bythebooth.com/php/ "http://www.bythebooth.com/php/")

hope you like em!

| --- | --- |

author: garus

comments.content: Excellent. Now the ultimate nerd can wear these on a [Veer Kern sweater](http://web.archive.org/web/20120211225756/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/merchdetail.aspx?image=VPR0001260) for maximum font geekage.

Go to [http://www.prickie.com/index.htm?artist=g77](http://web.archive.org/web/20120211225756/http:/www.prickie.com/index.htm?artist=g77 "http://www.prickie.com/index.htm?artist=g77") for the kern buttons

Thanks everyone!

[www.bythebooth.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120211225756/http:/www.bythebooth.com/ "www.bythebooth.com")
If you can get the Kern sweater. It was backordered when I tried to get it and I still don't know if Veer received my order because they never confirmed.
